Body:
"""Test using maximum derivative of temperature for ignition delay.
        """
a, b, c = [51329.3528, 0.316147043, 0.0105018205]
d = 1000 + 0.5 * np.sqrt(np.pi) * a * c * erf(b / c)
times = np.linspace(0, 1, 10000)
temperature = -0.5 * np.sqrt(np.pi) * a * c * erf((b - times) / c) + d
ignition_delays = simulation.get_ignition_delay(times, temperature,
    'temperature', 'd/dt max')
assert np.allclose(ignition_delays[0], b, rtol=0.0001)
